name: Gun 'n Go
description:
Made for MSCH G300 at IU

Use a combination of spints, dashes, grapples and wall runs to accelerate through the world! Three toggable weapons are available! In this level, you are timed and must destroy all of the crates to win.

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse - look around

Left click - fire weapon

Right click - use grappling hook

Shift - sprint

Left control - dash in whatever direction you are holding

C - change weapon
